articles.content: While we wait for the release of Pokemon Legends Z-A, Pokemon fans continue to enjoy semi-frequent events in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet. Shiny hunting is one of the biggest ways to keep engaging with… [+3083 chars]

articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Content Vaulting Causes More Legal Problems For Bungie - Forbes
articles.description: Destiny 2's decision to throw huge parts of the game in its content vault has now produced legal ramifications in their defense for a plagiarism lawsuit.
articles.content:
Destiny 2
Bungie
Bungie is in the middle of what seems like, on its face, a pretty far-fetched lawsuit filed by a man who believes story and lore aspects of Destiny 2 were stolen from work he poste… [+2590 chars]

articles.author: Kerry  Breen
articles.title: An NBA star's PSA inspired a man to check his mild symptoms. Doctors found an orange-sized mass - CBS News
articles.description: Warren Donaldson, 64, says Kareem Abdul-Jabbar's awareness campaign encouraged him to get his symptoms checked out.
articles.content:
Warren Donaldson didn't want to admit something was wrong. 
The 64-year-old was experiencing shortness of breath, heart palpitations and brief dizzy spells. At first, he dismissed them. By January 2… [+5853 chars]
